price: (36) And We found not within them other than a [single] house of Muslims.[1542]
arabic: فَمَا وَجَدۡنَا فِيهَا غَيۡرَ بَيۡتٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
footnotes: [1542]- i.e., Lot and his family, excepting his wife.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: famā wajadnā fīhā ghayra baytin mina al-mus'limīna
